title: Record Shelf Rediscovery
description: A simple project on the surface, for this React project I gained experience leveraging multiple existing APIs to create an app that is more than the sum of its parts. This has been an invaluable lesson in adapting my approaches to the shape of 3rd party incoming data.

title: The Subreddit Game
description: A full stack project using React and Redux with a Node/Express/MongoDB backend. On this project I really fleshed out my React/Redux knowledge as well as learning about WebSockets to allow seamless multiplayer, and LocalStorage to enable primitive session management.

title: Pace Calculator
description: A simple React tool I made for my partner after her favourite pace calculator went offline. It helped solidify what I'd recently learnt in React and allowed me to implement it in a tight project.

title: Contact Form Lambda
description: My original portfolio's contact form handler, which I'm re-using on here! I built a small back-end using AWS API Gateway connected to an AWS Lambda function using the Serverless framework to handle my contact form.
